lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, was I all by myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you got abandoned on that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was distracted by Marisha's call out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jump into the water at the same time! One, two, three! Meh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First one is our returning friends at D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And because we are such fine voice actors with talented accent skills--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you touching? Are you touching your ear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stuttering) If you don't use D&D Beyond, well, you've got a few kangaroos loose in your top paddock! Billabong!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So put on your sunnies, your thongs, your flannies, your knickers, your trekkie decks, light up a ciggie, fire up that lappie, and head on over to dndbeyond.com to pick up the newest D&D adventure! (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But! The newest D&D adventure, Ghosts-- (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The swashbuckling spooky adventure is finally here!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you also do the VO for the Outback Steakhouse? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does Australia-- how big is their standing army?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do? That's right! Oh no, he's out there! He's out there watching this right now! I'm going to get shivved or whatever they call it in Australia!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: -- plot device, man. That's the only difference.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was fine. Now I'm nervous about the game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, you have one over there right now that you have been using for quite some time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all right, you still got--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just took another d4 of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said that sentence. That was a real sentence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I know, it's-- It didn't hit me until yesterday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The people at Red Nose Day do incredible work to work towards ending child poverty and you guys have already raised an extremely generous amount for this. You are still available-- you are still able to make donations right now and it's still available at critrole.com/rednoseday and if you haven't had a chance to see the video it is up on our YouTube at the Crit Role channel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was pretty happy about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's been storming our studio this week.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Liam and Ashley definitely kept me on my toes along with some of the other players that you'll see.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Yeah, and it was really fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look for that next Friday, May 31st at 7:00pm in place of, well not in place of anything, it's a Friday, so thank you, Mark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess, Laura, you have a merch thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, funny you should say! Why yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really cool! You should see it up close, because it's got all the stuff, and it's like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's our pattern, it's a pattern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's other stuff in our store as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got cool dice that I'm excited about today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These were given to me a long time ago, but I just am now bringing them into the game, these--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to hold them up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're in the shape of your different, your different kind of characters so depending on what you're damage is, it's like, oh this is a sword, and it rolls a d6.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a mace or whatever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These would be good for you, Marisha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You go like that, and then it's a four that it landed on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been really excited about this shirt for a long time, so this isn't the first time I'm seeing it, but it's the first time you're seeing it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Marisha is wearing a bee.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --drop down into the moment that we left off in last time? Do we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Mighty Nein, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should be pulling those bodies through the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the body of the dragonborn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can put it in storage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll just cover it up in blankets or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's put it in the back room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I start dragging the dragonborn through the window into the back storage room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try to pull the horse through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I might have messed up, guys! I don't think the dragonborn was as important as I had initially thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, pretty sure we just shot the messenger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was that why this is-- that's a saying?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, I'm a pretty witty person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently inside, in the shop behind the counter, just sitting there watching you all carefully.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any more appointments on the books for today?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This was it? This was the only meeting you were booked for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not like I have an extensive ledger "where they contact me weeks in advance "and I fill out a calendar "and make sure I can fit them in before my morning coffee."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Insight check, does she have a ledger?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did the drow tell you how long they were staying upstairs, or...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They just paid for the entry fee "and then took the time "and if it ever overlaps, "I tell them to come back later."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much is the entry fee?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn, Maruo! That's a good hustle! Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Until, you know, people get murdered in here, but--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How often do people get murdered in here, actually?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not very often! "Because usually I do a much better job "of keeping it low-key."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we already search the dragonborn body before we pulled it in the window?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I think we're about to check upstairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You and I should go upstairs and check around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything we should know about up there before we start looking around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No traps! "But there is a little switch "under the table, "opens a chute."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She points to the storage room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Motherfuck, that's how she got out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Yasha and I will go up and start looking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll head up-- I may head up as well for this, with the two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment to look underneath and you can see underneath the table, part of the table leg, there's an additional iron rod that's pressed up against it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An iron rod on the back of-- on the inside of one of the table legs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the, oh, okay, that's the trap door, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to take the rest of the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys make investigation checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we-- in the end of the last game, did we already-- did I already tell Yasha what I heard from the messenger? Have we talked about that at all? Did we brush over that or did it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't recall, but you can definitely--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can rekindle that conversation, if you'd like to clarify.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Eight for the rest of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather, based on the type of meetings that might happen here, it's in the best interests of those who have come to a place outside of the visible spectrum of the rest of the city to find a space of complete safe neutrality.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we're searching around, I'm going to, oh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't mean to shoot you at all, any times, but three is even worse than one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But try not to do that again if you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. I also did all this and is everyone downstairs mad at me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You warned us, we came in, and...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you mad at yourself, I suppose?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I function much better with a little--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With a little bit of liquid courage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, you know, I wouldn't tell you not to do--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to see the streets, to see what the citizens of the town are doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or if there's any guards rushing to or anything that is a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any guard getting involved at the moment, but it does seem that, you know, it's being discussed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We probably shouldn't stay here long, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But wait, what if-- oh, I'm not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I don't know if Blondie's-- what did we name him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was the people who were here his liaisons or was that something totally unrelated?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, seems like a transaction was happening and happened.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he never said he was going to be here himself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The drow man, was he holding anything when he came in? Carrying anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, he had a pouch and travel gear, "but that's about it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're sure you don't keep any sign-in sheet, record?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's what I want to do, "is have a long sheet that implicates me "on every illegal activity that happens in my shop."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need us to tell him something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, this is just, I'll go left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You, I head upstairs, he has--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you head upstairs, you go downstairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was thinking, if there's a way that we could maybe magically keep tabs on the room, I don't know if there's a thread thing or if there's a thing you can do to alert us if people are in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we leave something behind, then Jester can scry through it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, I'm in the middle of something! I'm in the middle of talking to Yasha.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you know that guy that you were fighting?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've never seen either of them before in my life.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I think he knows you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It seems-- that seems-- it seems like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he was like, "Follow me north, bring her."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's kind of what I thought, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somehow when I sent him the message, He knew it was me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he was like, "I know you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You usually send it and you have to say who you are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, yeah, unless they know me, they don't know it's me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, what if he's scrying on us the way that I've been scrying on other people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To scry, you need to know someone traveling in a party, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could know about you or something and have been, I don't know!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think I've ever seen him before, I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it start with A? Does it start with B? Go through the alphabet that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, like was her name Agatha?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there anything, thinking of him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You got a taste of some curtains and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Actually, while we're discussing this, I walk over to the curtains and give them a little munch as myself as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somehow less tasty in your current form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you don't remember this person at all?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does he seem familiar to me at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have no recollection of meeting this individual before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Downstairs, didn't the hobby gobby also call you something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He called me by the name that was given to me by my tribe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is a cool-ass name, by the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the Orphan Maker was a name that you liked?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, my name is Yasha, but you know, when you...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you make an orphan by killing someone's parents?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) When you're taken into the tribe, you, I feel like maybe I have told you guys this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I think you totally have.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The name that was given to me was Orphan Maker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because she's really tough, you know that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We all have names like that, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! Why am I the Little Sapphire? I never knew. I couldn't figure it out, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're shiny and blue and beautiful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That makes perfect sense, actually, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which leads me to believe that maybe Yasha has killed someone's parents.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think you're all given a name in your tribe that maybe calls out whatever your destiny will be.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think you know, it's all-- we're all given names that are supposed to sound scary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are some of the other scary names that people got?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah! Were they all dark and--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, they're all dark and they're scary.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're all, you know, big and scary names.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But it's weird that they know that because that was only known in my tribe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to follow him north?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I want to know why they know who I am.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll talk with everyone and see what everyone wants to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You pull that damn switch yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we were staring at the stupid chute, seeing what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a little latch that's let loose, and as it flies open, you guys watch as part of the ceiling in the storage chamber that's off to the side of the apothecary, hangs open at an angle, and there's room for somebody to slide down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Woo! I go slide down it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like an action figure play set.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just told Frumpkin to keep look out and tell me if anything comes close or if there's any sort of stir beyond what I've already seen and drop down. What are we doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're going to check out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I land on Caleb coming down the-- (impact) Hi!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We ever check out that weird magic door in the back corner by the way, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was-- that was the bodyguard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I sent the message to the guy, he said, "Follow me north if you really want to talk to me," or something. And he said, "Bring her," and I think he means Yasha, and we're probably going to go, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, look, we're counting on this, right? We said we were going to deliver, if we come back empty-handed, we're not going to look too--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, Maruo, you've got to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, no! Look, I have been cordial, "I have been very up front about all of this!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am actually of the opinion that there might be an option here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that we can come to a financial arrangement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, to be fair, even if we leave right now, with the giant pile of bodies in here, is a big problem for these two, anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is true. Where's Jester at?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, Jessie. You still got that spell that lets you track people wherever they go and so they are incentivized to play along with what we ask?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you do that on old (clicking) over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I say: Blanky blanky doo, shallagam, shalloo! (laughter) I use Thaumaturgy to flare my eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you fuck us over, because it could go bad for you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you do the really strong one where they just die instantly if they break their--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the only one I know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got to say, there's a possibility that after this has blown over maybe this could turn into a fruitful relationship for everybody involved.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You certainly do not want to piss off the Empress herself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's good, you don't want to know all the details.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just want to know what we tell you

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're well known for our mixed messages, it's part of who we are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who was in your shop today?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How did all these bodies get in here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's the craziest thing! "I woke up and they were there."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, yeah, I might suggest that we take a couple of these bodies with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See, that's great, too! "Please, that'd be great!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could take them underneath, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to talk to both of them, to be honest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's this tunnel go? Can we take them down to the tunnel for now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The tunnel goes from the second floor to the first floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Both of them including the horse?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I'm not a hundred percent convinced that these were the people we were looking for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You talk to them. I'll talk to the horse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know how to speak horse?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know how to talk to dead horses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just don't beat a dead horse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually can't talk to them until tomorrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were supposed to intercept Greg, Blonde Greg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who you definitely heard say that he was coming here in person?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, do I remember? If I definitely heard that he was coming or I just heard the date and the arrival?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To ensure that I'm not getting this wrong for you either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She has so many notes, how do you find anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why I don't write anything down anymore, because I figure she's going to know it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sounds about right. We'll go with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Female paranoia's probably the Bright Queen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But Greg didn't say, "I will be there personally in 13 days."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This thing will happen at the Overcrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got the money and now he's got the emblem or whatever it is that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Says, yes I have the emblem, waiting for a window, but let's plot for the next Grissen, wait, Grissen the week after. The Overcrow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he going to be trading under the Bright Queen's emblem into some--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So Greg sent the emblem, sold it for 50 platinum, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's, there was 50 platinum involved.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't know if this-- she's said-- how many meetings do you usually have in a day, Maruo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like one a week, it's not that often."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was the only one today?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This may be stupid, but if they have the emblem and it's similar to our emblems, are they trying to create a distraction on the war front so they can do a singular attack here, and try and hit somebody of high importance with that emblem? Like a fucking DEF CON one badge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That feels like an awful lot of--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They mentioned putting Scourgers in, I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go, we have to follow him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can't be left here holding the bag.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yes, I heard, the only word that I clearly heard was Bazozian.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait a minute, I think that's a place.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know if I've been there, but I feel like I've seen it on the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's north, that's where he said to follow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many days' ride do you think that is? Bazzoxan?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where are we at right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, both Fjord and Beauregard, make an intelligence saving-- or an intelligence check, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trying to look up distances and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did you say saving throw or just--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can go around the outside path, that's known as the Hollowed Path.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's up to you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm assuming the Barbed Fields is more deadly and less traveled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Barbed Fields was the ground zero for the final battles of the Calamity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we're definitely going through there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hell yeah! That sounds fucking awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take me on that TMZ tour!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that like entering into the level 20 zone, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't care! We are here!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Barbed Zone, is that what it is? Is that what it's called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait, I don't-- "I'm not following this at all."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've only seen half of the first season!" (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you ever been through the Barbed Fields?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What? No! "Why would you want to go there? "That place is--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're not from around here, are you?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can you tell us about the Barbed Fields?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And it's hot during the day "and there's all sorts of terrible creatures "and weird errant magic that "lingers from back when "all the crazy-ass gods were fighting and shit and-- "I don't know, I just-- that's all I know!"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any groups in town that regularly make their way out there to scavenge for relics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "None that I'd care to really know "and few that come back, I'm sure."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know, I haven't been there!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we talk to your doctor friend, what's their name?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe they could shed some light.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't feel like talking to anyone, I feel like getting out of town right away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we do, I don't want anything getting back--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could send a message to the Bright Queen and see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no, no, no, don't, she thought we were--

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's lots of competing gods in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the Angel of Irons isn't a god, maybe the Angel of Irons is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could also be a god, it could be a demigod.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we need to talk to the dragonborn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to talk to the dragonborn, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should you also look like the blonde guy for this one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be myself for this one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want me over your shoulder?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I still look like the guy he was meeting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's, she did do the hand-off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Up to you, this is your call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull out the dragonborn head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's all I'm going to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Its jaw opens to try and draw breath.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so Santa Clarita Diet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasps) The jaw opens and the head falls to the side again, because it opens the jaw, it has to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to hold it, because this is going to, this is not civilized.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're not in the guy's form.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not in the guy, that's right, which is why I was like-- because they don't know who I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, which crest? Whose crest, I suppose would be the better question.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who is the Angel of Irons?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who were the people you were meeting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who do you work for? Who do you serve?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I serve no one, "I work for those who pay me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that's all of them, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like that may have been four, but.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm feeling like it was five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, where did you meet him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did you meet your last employer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would definitely call that five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, it's in the Empire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's our Empire map? We've been near there, haven't we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, it's right on the other side of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though both Beauregard and Caleb can both make history checks, if you'd like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I live right next to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but you didn't travel much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you can make a history check, too, if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's temporary, but it's become more permanent, which means it's not a very--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what is the Empire proper's feelings about them? Are they just tolerated, are they--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's close to the border of Xhorhas, it's right south of Bladegarden.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gather up the heads and them put them back into the bag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who was it you wanted me to send messages to, again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, should we message the Bright Queen and just say: Mission is continuing, almost to the end?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should keep her in the dark for the time being.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, certainly she heard of the action around her town today.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to try and message the one that we're chasing and pretend to throw him off the trail and if he is scrying on us, or keeping tabs on us, he'll let us know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or check in with your family, Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See if anyone else showed up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good one, let's start there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to start with Maruo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey Maruo, any other people show up there? This is the blue girl! Remember, we'll kill you if you're lying! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who else should I talk to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would love to check in, just tell Yeza we're still okay, but you know, I don't want to waste a spell if we have other folks that we need--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's two, we'll go with two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll probably clean up a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's actually been, "No, we're good, we're--" (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aww! You should have brought him a coat or something before we left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he has to boil the water himself!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had enough words after that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He loves you so much! Last person?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've been thinking a lot about your child, and your mother's house and I'm not sure that your mother's house is the best place to send your child after all, perhaps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, what if the letter that you two sent has brought attention there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'd have to really do some research and I don't know how smart the people are, that are in your organization, but they probably wouldn't be able to figure it out, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, what if I send the message to the owner of the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And say what? Accidentally might have alerted the worst people in the world?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If the child shows up, I, it seems like an unnecessary risk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then at least my mom can find somewhere else to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does your mom have safe houses or anything--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course she does, she knows a lot of people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, that would be kind of hard to...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'd just be going to the safe house for no reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be hard for her to go to this--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She doesn't like to leave her house? Because of work?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She just doesn't feel comfortable, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she scared of the outside or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She feels safe in the Chateau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's worth using that last message spell to just check in with her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, well, she's, she was, on the short side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This was a long time ago.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It pains me to say that even, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shäkaste isn't going to even be there for some time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should call that off or just tell Shäkaste to hold until we know more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he can go to the wizard's tower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, I don't know what the wizard feels about this right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, I would like to maybe bring your child to Rosohna.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're making a lot of assumptions on information we don't fully know yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it's a very us thing to do, but.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I send a message to my mom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She misses me! I don't have any more 3rd-level spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, I'm just joking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can lift and read a book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll let my mama know that next time I talk to her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to make life a little easier, I'll spend our last ten minutes before we go to sleep casting a Prayer of Healing for anybody who needs a little bit of HP even before they restore their own stuff, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would not turn it down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 hit points to anybody who wants it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin will wake me if he sees anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No light gets out, it's just dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sit atop your moorbounders and continue on for your third day outside of Rosohna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll just go one more day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 10:30. If you guys want to go to 11:00, we can keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he's not going to call it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to read some stuff before I go, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I gots to get home and pump.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Further into the Barbed Fields of Xhorhas.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like old times, yeah, eight hour games!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can Postmates some mimosas, this is not a problem! Get some scones up in this bitch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we Amazon Prime in a pump machine? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Send it on a drone! (imitating drone motor)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, it'd be so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. That's so cool, you guys are amazing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no problem you can't solve with your fists.
